column4: this is probably a longshot, but my headphone jack on my laptop is physically broken, and I was wondering if it is possible to reroute the output to the mic jack. I have a feeling it's wired so that isn't possible, but if any of you think it might be possible, I would appreciate your help.
: Not sure , but let me see if I can help ya out
:  if you have a header for plugs /frontside you can cross jumpers...if you have multichannel, you can select another output for stereo
: Go to ##linux and ask the same question you had . they, I believe have more support ( Or atleast you'd get what you need from there )
